title: Identify the Subject Pronoun
prompt: Choose the correct subject pronoun for the sentence: ___ am happy.

ja.prompt: 文の主語代名詞を選んでください：___ am happy.
ja.hint: 主語代名詞 / I / he / she

zh.prompt: 選出句子的主格代名詞：___ am happy。
zh.hint: 主格代名詞 / 我 / 他 / 她

title: Correct the Pronoun
prompt: Correct the pronoun in this sentence: Him is my friend.

ja.prompt: この文の代名詞を直してください：Him is my friend.
ja.hint: 代名詞 / 主語 / 修正

zh.prompt: 改正句子中的代名詞：Him is my friend。
zh.hint: 代名詞 / 主格 / 改正

title: Choose the Object Pronoun
prompt: Fill in the blank with the correct object pronoun: I see ___.

ja.prompt: 正しい目的格代名詞を入れてください：I see ___.
ja.hint: 目的格代名詞 / him / she / they

zh.prompt: 填入正確的受格代名詞：I see ___.
zh.hint: 受格代名詞 / 他 / 她 / 他們

title: Rewrite with Subject Pronouns
prompt: Rewrite the sentence using subject pronouns: Sarah and I are friends.

ja.prompt: 主語代名詞を使って文を書き換えてください：Sarah and I are friends.
ja.hint: 主語代名詞 / we / Sarah / I

zh.prompt: 用主格代名詞改寫句子：Sarah and I are friends。
zh.hint: 主格代名詞 / 我們 / Sarah / 我

title: Identify the Incorrect Pronoun
prompt: Find the wrong pronoun in this sentence: Her and me went to the park.
sample: The correct sentence is: She and I went to the park.

ja.prompt: この文の間違った代名詞を見つけてください：Her and me went to the park.
ja.hint: 間違った代名詞 / her / me / 主語
ja.sample: 正しい文は：She and I went to the park.

zh.prompt: 找出句子中錯誤的代名詞：Her and me went to the park。
zh.hint: 錯誤代名詞 / her / me / 主格
zh.sample: 正確句子是：She and I went to the park.

title: Fill in the Blank with Possessive Pronoun
prompt: Complete the sentence with a possessive pronoun: This book is ___.

ja.prompt: 所有格代名詞を入れて文を完成させてください：This book is ___.
ja.hint: 所有格代名詞 / mine / his / her

zh.prompt: 用所有格代名詞完成句子：This book is ___.
zh.hint: 所有格代名詞 / 我的 / 他的 / 她的

title: Choose the Correct Pronoun for a Group
prompt: Select the correct pronoun: ___ are going to the party. (talking about Tom and Jerry)
sample: They are going to the party.

ja.prompt: 正しい代名詞を選んでください：___ are going to the party.（TomとJerryについて）
ja.sample: They are going to the party.

zh.prompt: 選出正確的代名詞：___ are going to the party。（說的是Tom和Jerry）
zh.hint: 代名詞 / 他們 / 他 / 她
zh.sample: They are going to the party.

title: Replace Nouns with Pronouns
prompt: Replace the nouns with pronouns: Mary and John like ice cream.

ja.prompt: 名詞を代名詞に置き換えてください：Mary and John like ice cream.
ja.hint: 置き換え / 代名詞 / Mary / John

zh.prompt: 用代名詞替換名詞：Mary and John like ice cream。
zh.hint: 替換 / 代名詞 / Mary / John

title: Correct the Sentence with Pronouns
prompt: Fix the sentence: Me and him is best friends.
sample: He and I are best friends.

ja.prompt: 文を直してください：Me and him is best friends.
ja.hint: 代名詞 / 主語 / 修正
ja.sample: He and I are best friends.

zh.prompt: 修正句子：Me and him is best friends。
zh.hint: 代名詞 / 主格 / 修正
zh.sample: He and I are best friends.

title: Use the Correct Pronoun in Question
prompt: Answer the question with the correct pronoun: Who is calling? (Answer: It is ___. )

ja.prompt: 正しい代名詞で答えてください：Who is calling? (答え：It is ___. )

zh.prompt: 用正確的代名詞回答問題：Who is calling?（回答：It is ___.）
zh.hint: 代名詞 / 它 / 他 / 她

title: Distinguish Between Subject and Object Pronouns
prompt: Choose the correct pronoun: ___ gave the book to ___. (I / me)
sample: I gave the book to him.

ja.prompt: 正しい代名詞を選んでください：___ gave the book to ___. (I / me)
ja.hint: 主語 / 目的語 / 代名詞
ja.sample: I gave the book to him.

zh.prompt: 選出正確的代名詞：___ gave the book to ___.（I / me）
zh.hint: 主格 / 受格 / 代名詞
zh.sample: I gave the book to him.
